Welcome to Ontospy’s documentation!¶

Ontospy is a lightweight Python library and command line tool for inspecting and visualizing vocabularies encoded in the RDF family of languages.

Note

2017-03-17: The documentation has moved to the GitHub Wiki: https://github.com/lambdamusic/Ontospy/wiki

Ontospy is a lightweight Python library and command line tool for inspecting vocabularies encoded in the RDF family of languages.
